name: PACmanJBBlaze
short_description:
PACman Rom Galaxy Blaze 4G


PACman merges some of the best features from Paranoid Android, AOKP, and CyanogenMod into one uber-featured ROM. This includes CM10 settings, AOKP Settings, and ParanoidAndroid settings—plus all the interconnected cherry picks you could ever wants

However, the ParanoidAndroid crew have asked that the ParanoidPreferences.apk be taken out of the ROM. It can be grabbed from any ParanoidAndroid ROM

Installation:

Download to sdcard
reboot recovery
Backup
wipe data/system/cache/dalvik
install downloaded zip
reboot and wait 5 minutes...
reboot recovery
flash JellyBean GAPPS if you wish
reboot and enjoy...

Thanks:

Google for source of course
dr4stic- for his awesome kernel fixes 
CyanogenMod
AOKP
PAC-man
and anyone else I may have forgotten

LINKS:

ROM: https://sourceforge.net/projects/aok...oad?source=dlp

GAPPS : http://goo.im/gapps/gapps-jb-20121128-signed.zip
